title: Designing Evolutionary Learning Communities: A Systems Thinking-Based Practice Framework

context.prior_knowledge: Requirement of intermediate theoretical background and practical experience
context.additional_context: Enhances evolutionary design capabilities through collaborative learning and iterative feedback cycles among learners.

learning_goals: Learners can apply system design principles to develop a sustainable learning community prototype
Learners can explain the three core conditions (operational definition, designer competence, learning framework) to consider when designing ELC
Learners can propose evolutionary learning solutions through a multidisciplinary approach (system design, environmental sustainability, etc.)
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
